Posts.Content: Hi Angel I'm sorry your scared. Where hoping my mum will be starting 3rd bout of chemo and radio soon, she has always said to me that as long as she could do one small thing to make her smile each day it was worth it even if she cried for the rest of it. I hope you find something to make you smile. Even if she was scared it released the tension for her.
Posts.Title: so my nightmare begins
